name: SFD: Skyscraper fuel delivery
description:
"General robotics" corporation requests your help!

Your mission is simple - go down to earth from the top of a skyscraper to the first floor to take fuel for nuclear generators from old warehouses and save the "General robotics" corporation.

Unfortunately, you have to deal with "rebels" - crazy robots that could disintegrate you by their lasers. They look like below:

Stay away from their sight and everything will be OK!

Use your special abilities to complete your mission successfully!

SFD is a single-player sci-fi top-down adventure/puzzle with stealth elements, 8 levels and a story about a robot as a worker.

Please, note that all missions were tested multiple times both in the story and non-story modes and could be completed successfully.
But I suggest you play in a story mode firstly. It could be selected in the main menu and makes the game simpler. 

P.S. If you have problems with the last missions in non-story mode, then simply be patient and you'll complete them.
